mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WAT_GAP_MSG_CD SELECT A.MSG_CD ,A.SYS_DVCD ,A.MSG_PTRN_DVCD ,A.MSG_BZWR_DVCD ,A.MSG_CNTN ,A.USE_YN ,'U' AS GAP_STATUS FROM V_MESSAGE_CD_LIST A INNER JOIN WAT_MSG_CD B ON NVL(A.MSG_CD,'-') = NVL(B.MSG_CD,'-') AND NVL(A.SYS_DVCD,'-')= NVL(B.SYS_DVCD,'-') AND NVL(A.MSG_PTRN_DVCD,'-')= NVL(B.MSG_PTRN_DVCD,'-') AND NVL(A.MSG_BZWR_DVCD,'-')= NVL(B.MSG_BZWR_DVCD,'-') WHERE NVL(A.MSG_CNTN ,'-') != NVL(B.MSG_CNTN ,'-') OR NVL(A.USE_YN ,'-') != NVL(B.USE_YN ,'-') UNION ALL SELECT A.MSG_CD ,A.SYS_DVCD ,A.MSG_PTRN_DVCD ,A.MSG_BZWR_DVCD ,A.MSG_CNTN ,A.USE_YN ,'I' AS GAP_STATUS FROM V_MESSAGE_CD_LIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAT_MSG_CD B ON NVL(A.MSG_CD,'-') = NVL(B.MSG_CD,'-') AND NVL(A.SYS_DVCD,'-')= NVL(B.SYS_DVCD,'-') AND NVL(A.MSG_PTRN_DVCD,'-')= NVL(B.MSG_PTRN_DVCD,'-') AND NVL(A.MSG_BZWR_DVCD,'-')= NVL(B.MSG_BZWR_DVCD,'-') WHERE B.MSG_CD IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT B.MSG_CD ,B.SYS_DVCD ,B.MSG_PTRN_DVCD ,B.MSG_BZWR_DVCD ,B.MSG_CNTN ,B.USE_YN ,'D' AS GAP_STATUS FROM V_MESSAGE_CD_LIST A RIGHT OUTER JOIN WAT_MSG_CD B ON NVL(A.MSG_CD,'-') = NVL(B.MSG_CD,'-') AND NVL(A.SYS_DVCD,'-')= NVL(B.SYS_DVCD,'-') AND NVL(A.MSG_PTRN_DVCD,'-')= NVL(B.MSG_PTRN_DVCD,'-') AND NVL(A.MSG_BZWR_DVCD,'-')= NVL(B.MSG_BZWR_DVCD,'-') WHERE A.MSG_CD IS NULL
